title: Sejuani's Traditional Splash-Art
body:
That splash is amazing!
Just a question....is it Lore-friendly?
It seems that the skin represents Sej when she was younger but that could be wrong.
You tell me
[](https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9SLg8_5_LZY/WQJB_ADDaOI/AAAAAAABDJA/0xIsFjMoz3UYwxG869rOnQjdcpz6HLZhQCLcB/s1600/Sejuani_Splash_3.jpg)

replies.body: I always imagined Traditional Sejuani (Even the old splash) as canon, as her not giving in to the brutalities of winter and only adopting armor when war created a necessity for it.
Yes, it is meant to be young Sejuani
ok, now can we know who is next after Sejuani and Mokai soon???
We are currently going into the early stages of a Miss Fortune Splash update. She has a lot of splashes that need updating so we are only going to be focusing on just her for now.
will you be doing another blog on champion updates soon as well, I'd really love to know which class is next for a kit update (pls be the Controllers, i want my Sona splashes)
We will likely do another dev blog sometime after Urgot releases in the 2nd half of the year. Plan is to do one every 6 months or so.
Does this mean then you'll announce next 2 after Urgot and Eve, rumors are that you guys started exploration already
We have started on exploration for the next 2, yes. The plan would be to talk about them in the next devblog. That is if we have commuted to the next 2 by that time.
Oh, I'm really looking forward to the next Ryze VGU.
I can't wait to see the new version of his point-click root that's crucial part of his kit that tons of people don't complain about. Kappapult.
Also can possibly ask who is lead on Urgot at the moment, Repertoir said he started him but another dev is finishing. Would it happen to be 20thCenturyFaux
BelugaWhale is currently the designer on Urgot, he took it over from Repertoir. 20thCenturyFaux and SolCrushed are both currently in ideation teams looking into whats next.

How do you decide which designers do the vgu's? Also, what works has 20thCenturyFaux done?

Also tell SolCrushed I I lovehis work. He seems to be the main designer for a lot of VGU'd champions and they always come out great.
20thCenturyFaux did the LeBlanc, Zyra and Brand updates recently. Before that he also worked on the last small Zilean update.

Yeah but Mundo is pretty high on our list for a full VGU one day. All his splashes should be updated then
Hey Reav3 would you guys potentially delay a candidate for a VGU if the severity of their gameplay issues was reduced due to like a mini rework like Akali's assassin mini rework

Not likely. Akali still has a huge ceiling when it comes to "potential" if given a VGU. "Ninja Girl" is a thematic that a lot of our players connect with and we still want to work on her just as badly so that we can bring that thematic up to modern standards.
Where would you place Tryndamere when it comes to thematics? As a Barbarian King, I don't think his kit has anything to do with it.
I think Tryndamere needs a lot of work when we do get to him. His kit hasn't aged very well and he looks a bit generic as well.
Generic in what way? Would you say Olaf is generic in appearance?

Yes, very much so. If we were to make Olaf today he would be far less generic. Warwick before his VGU was kind of generic as well. Warwick feels much more like a part of Runterra and unique to LoL after his VGU.

Is there ever gonna be an official answer as to why "captain miss fortune" isn't her default skin? The character in-game isn't the character in the lore anymore(visually or personality wise). This has bothered me since the bilgewater event.

I'd say its something similar to what they did with Gangplank.

Before GP got "officially" released, the Captain skin was his default skin for about a week......then the lore event happened. You now have the opportunity to play Gangplank as he was _before_ the lore event.

For MF, it's the other way around. Her base skin is her before the lore event, and her Captain skin is her afterwards. That, or you could think of it as her base skin as her "everyday, no-need-to-worry" wardrobe, and her Captain skin as her "Lets get to work, and kick some ass" wardrobe.

Does this help?

Her base skin and VO is the same as the old gangplank(before the "captain' and now current GP skins). MF _is_ and always has been "captain MF" according to the bilge-water lore event. Riot just never bothered to put the resources into making her in-game reflect her now "true" character. Which is really fuked when when you realize that {{champion:41}} got remade TWICE! for this event. new model and VO for both "captain" and "now default" gangplank.
